EmailTemplate.name: NP - Change State of Formation
EmailTemplate.subject: Your LegalZoom Inquiry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Thank you for contacting LegalZoom for your business needs. In regard to your inquiry, LegalZoom can assist you in moving your organization to a new state. We simplify the process for you by preparing and filing the Articles of Dissolution with your respective Secretary of State, and by preparing and filing the Articles of Incorporation with the new Secretary of State, and by providing templates for drafting the Bylaws & Resolutions for the entity.
For your reference, general information regarding dissolving an existing Non-Profit Corporation and filing a new Non-Profit Corporation has been outlined below. If you would like to get specific, detailed information on your personal situation, please contact a Business Formation Specialist at the phone number listed below. By speaking with a Specialist will be able to assist with answering further questions, as well as building a customized package to best benefit your needs.
Because Non-Profit Corporations are state-specific entities, it is typically not possible to directly move a Non-Profit Corporation from one state to another. The process of relocating an entity to a new state is typically accomplished by dissolving the entity in the current state, and filing a new entity in the new state. This change may require the entity to obtain a new Employer Identification Number (EIN), however you may contact the IRS directly to inquire about the possibility of keeping the existing EIN. You may also wish to contact the IRS to determine what effect this process will have on the tax exempt status of the entity.
For your convenience, we have listed below all relevant pricing, as well as some additional services that may be beneficial to your business.
DISSOLUTION Rush - $239.00 + state fee - (10-15 business days)* Standard - $129.00 + state fee + shipping - (20-30 business days)
To view the state fee for your state, please follow the "GET STARTED" link below and select your state from the drop-down list.
GET STARTED http://www.legalzoom.com/additional-business-services/articles-of-dissolution-corporation-llc.html
NON-PROFIT CORPORATION Express Gold - $359.00 + state fee - (7-10 business days)* Standard - $239.00 + state fee + shipping - (20-35 business days) Economy - $99.00 + state fee + shipping - (20-35 business days)
To view the state fee for your state, please follow the "PACKAGE DETAILS" link below and select your state from the drop-down list.
GET STARTED http://www.legalzoom.com/non-profits/non-profit-corporation-overview.html PACKAGE DETAILS http://www.legalzoom.com/non-profits/non-profits-packages.html
ADDITIONAL SERVICES EIN Obtainment - $79.00 ($49.00 with Express Gold package) 501(c) Application Preparation - $495.00 (with any package) Registered Agent - $159.00/year
* Some states may have delays which affect the listed turnaround time. To determine if your state is affected, please contact a Specialist at the phone number listed below.
Thank you for contacting LegalZoom with your business inquiries, and we look forward to assisting you. If you have any additional questions, please feel free to contact us by phone at the phone number listed below.
Best regards,
{!User.FirstName} (800) 773-0888 x{!User.Extension} www.legalzoom.com
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
